pages.text: $(italic)Parkour$() is a kind of sports, organized by $(italic)David Belle$().$(br)Parkour is an activity that humans move to another point quickly as possible by oneself.$(br2)The name comes from $(italic)parcours$() of French, and the players called $(italic)Traceur$().$(br)Sometimes Parkour is called $(italic)Free Running$(). This is said to be a English translation of Parkour.
